title: Create commercial product catalog with WhatsApp contact and admin panel

requirements.text: Create a product catalog interface displaying products with images, names, descriptions, and prices in a visually appealing grid layout

quotes: make a web site for commercial web site which is stable , facinated

acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed in a responsive grid layout
Each product card shows image, name, description, and price
Layout is visually appealing and professional

requirements.text: Add a prominent WhatsApp contact button on each product that opens WhatsApp with a pre-filled message containing the product name

quotes: when any one want to buy product they can easyly get my wattsapp number

acceptanceCriteria: Each product has a visible WhatsApp button
Clicking the button opens WhatsApp with product details pre-filled
Works on both mobile and desktop browsers

requirements.text: Implement public product browsing without any sign-up, login, or authentication requirements for visitors

quotes: their no need to do sign up or login they can easyly acces thier

acceptanceCriteria: Visitors can view all products immediately without creating an account
No login prompts or barriers appear for browsing
Product catalog loads instantly on page visit

requirements.text: Create an admin panel accessible through Internet Identity that allows adding, editing, and deleting products including their names, descriptions, prices, and images

quotes: provide me domain also for i can easyly access to change the product or rs

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can log in using Internet Identity
Admin can create new products with all details
Admin can edit existing product information and prices
Admin can delete products from the catalog
Changes are immediately reflected on the public catalog

requirements.text: Implement backend data model and CRUD operations for products including fields for name, description, price, image URL, and WhatsApp number
acceptanceCriteria: Products are stored persistently in stable memory
CRUD operations support all product fields
Data persists across canister upgrades
Products can be retrieved for public display

requirements.text: Design a visually captivating and professional aesthetic using warm, earthy tones (terracotta, sage green, cream) with elegant serif typography for headings and clean sans-serif for body text, creating a modern boutique feel with generous whitespace and subtle shadows
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm, earthy tones consistently throughout
Typography combines serif headings with sans-serif body text
Layout feels spacious with generous whitespace
Overall design conveys professionalism and sophistication

constraints: Public product browsing must work without any authentication
Admin features must be protected by Internet Identity authentication
All product data must persist across canister upgrades
nonGoals: User accounts or customer login system

required: Hero banner image showing elegant product display setup with warm lighting (hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png)
Placeholder product image for items without photos, minimalist design (product-placeholder.dim_400x400.png)
